name: Snake (itch) (Destroyer636)
description:
Objective: Eat as many apples as you can without running into the border or yourself

Controls: Use the arrow keys to change the direction of your snake. Press space at any point to pause/restart the game.

The more apples you eat, the longer your snake becomes. Press any arrow key to start the game.  If the game is not responding, click on the game and try again.
